title: Nottingham church minister's journey from drugs and gang crime
description: Paul Traynor is an ordained minister but he was once caught in a cycle of crime, drugs and violence.

title: Annabel Williams: Behind the scenes secrets of a celebrity vocal coach
description: She has voice-trained Amy Winehouse, Jennifer Hudson and reckons she can help anyone to sing.

title: Why bonding over the Euros appeared to increase Covid cases in men
description: Psychologists say men need to be part of a group in order to vent their feelings and emotions.

title: EastEnders: 'I was ignorant about my schizophrenia'
description: Antonio Ferreira is using his personal experience to advise the soap on a storyline.

title: Finding answers to the world's drinking water crisis
description: Scientists are racing to come up with technologies that can solve the world's clean water shortage.

title: Then and now: The burning issue of wildfires
description: Scientists are increasingly concerned climate change is making fires more frequent and more intense.

title: Iran water: What's causing the shortages?
description: Iranian officials have warned of historic drought while experts blame years of poor water management.

title: Afghanistan: Orphan's reunion with British soldier after 19 years
description: Ramin Paikar was among the orphans visited by British soldiers stationed in Kabul in 2002.

title: Tokyo Olympics: Man builds squirrel course in Hitchin garden
description: Steve Barley spent almost three months building the course, designed around events in a heptathlon.

title: Nigerian student shocked to see friend's body in anatomy class
description: Nigerian students often dissect "unclaimed" bodies from mortuaries but some are victims of police violence.

title: 'You can be African and black and play polo'
description: Molawa Adesuyi is calling for more young people from ethnic minority backgrounds to take up his sport.

title: Tokyo Olympics: How GB swimmers roared their way to record success at Tokyo 2020
description: From missed medal targets to funding cuts - how Team GB's swimmers have gone onto succeed in Japan and how bright does the future look heading towards Paris?

title: Tokyo Olympics: 'Can we have two golds?' - high jumpers share win
description: An incredible Olympic high jump final ended with both Qatar's Mutaz Essa Barshim and Italy's Gianmarco Tamberi taking gold medals.

title: BMX 360 backflip: The trick that secured Charlotte Worthington Team GB gold
description: A trick revered, unexpected and never done by a woman before - what is the backflip 360 pulled off by Charlotte Worthington?

title: Tokyo Olympics: How Team GB's Max Whitlock won pommel horse gold as rivals faltered
description: Watch how Team GB's Max Whitlock defended his Olympic pommel horse title, performing the first routine in the final and setting a mark that his rivals could not match at Tokyo 2020.

title: Abergele holiday park incident: Man held as girl, 15, dies
description: A 15-year-old girl dies and a 19-year-old man has been arrested after the incident on Saturday.

title: Tokyo Olympics: Great Britain eventers in strong medal positions after cross-country
description: Oliver Townend leads the individual eventing standings at the Olympics after the cross-country phase as the GB team retain top spot.

title: Whitlock fires Team GB gold medal tally to 10
description: Charlotte Worthington wins a dramatic BMX park freestyle Olympic gold as Max Whitlock retains pommel horse title.

title: NI vaccine passport application date extended
description: People travelling abroad from Northern Ireland on Tuesday can now apply for the certificate.

title: Volunteer race marshal dies in Brands Hatch crash
description: The marshal died after an accident during a race at the track, leading to the cancellation of the event.

title: Tokyo Olympics: Max Whitlock defends Olympic pommel horse title
description: Great Britain's Max Whitlock produces a sublime performance to defend his Olympic title by winning gold in the men's pommel horse.

title: Covid: Taxi and food discounts offer to boost youth vaccine uptake
description: The government's latest vaccine drive comes as 68% of 18 to 29-year-olds in England have had a first jab.

title: Tokyo Olympics: Max Whitlock defends Olympic pommel horse title
description: Great Britain's Max Whitlock retains his Olympic pommel horse title with a flawless routine in Tokyo.

title: Sky News Australia barred for week by YouTube over Covid misinformation
description: The digital giant bans the channel from uploading new content for a week over misinformation breaches.

title: Tokyo Olympics: Xander Schauffele wins gold on dramatic final day
description: American Xander Schauffele clinches the men's golf gold medal on a dramatic final day in the men's Olympic golf.

title: Bridgend river death: Police keep 'open mind' after boy, 5, dies
description: The boy was found after police were called to reports of a missing child on Saturday morning.

title: Matt Dawson column: British and Irish Lions crying out for creative player
description: Former Lion Matt Dawson says the tour is crying out for a player to create a moment that turns the tide.

title: The reluctant history-maker in sport's transgender debate
description: Weightlifter Laurel Hubbard is set to become the first openly transgender athlete to compete in a different gender category to that which they were born at an Olympics.

title: New Zealand Dawn Raids: Jacinda Ardern formally apologises
description: Jacinda Ardern says Pacific Islander communities still "suffer and carry the scars" from the policy.

title: Afghanistan: Taliban continue attacks on three major cities
description: Fears rise of a humanitarian crisis as Islamist militants seek to take their first provincial capital.

title: Tokyo Olympics: Mourad Aliev in ring protest after Frazer Clarke defeat
description: Frenchman Mourad Aliev refuses to live the ring in the aftermath of his controversial loss to Great Britain's Frazer Clarke.

title: Pre-surgery photoshoot 'was not pornographic'
description: Alison Walker signed up for a boudoir photoshoot before having a double mastectomy.

title: Tokyo Olympics: Brilliant BMX, unbeatable Dressel and more boxing success in day nine early best bits
description: Watch the best moments from the early events on day nine at the Tokyo Olympics, including dramatic BMX finals and more swimming and boxing success for Great Britain.

title: Tokyo Olympics: Ben Whittaker into final as Frazer Clarke beats Mourad Aliev
description: Ben Whittaker will fight for Olympic boxing gold, while fellow Briton Frazer Clarke lands a controversial victory in Tokyo.

title: The Papers: 'Kebabs for jabs' and 'baby no 2' for PM and Carrie
description: Several papers report that Boris Johnson and wife Carrie are expecting their second child together.

title: Turkey: Foreign tourists evacuated as wildfires threaten resorts
description: Coastguard vessels and private boats have brought holidaymakers to safety, as the death toll rises.

title: Scott wins most GB medals at single Olympics
description: Great Britain win a record eighth swimming medal in Tokyo while Duncan Scott becomes the most decorated British Olympian at a Games.

title: Worthington recovers from fall to win BMX gold in Tokyo while Brooks takes bronze
description: Great Britain's Charlotte Worthington wins a thrilling gold in the women's BMX park freestyle Olympic final.

title: Tokyo Olympics: GB's Charlotte Worthington wins BMX freestyle gold in dramatic final
description: Watch the dramatic closing stages of the BMX freestyle final as Britain's Charlotte Worthington narrowly beats USA's Hannah Roberts to gold at Tokyo 2020.

title: Tokyo Olympics: Great Britain win record eighth swimming medal with men's 4x100m relay silver
description: Great Britain wins a record eighth swimming medal in Tokyo while Duncan Scott ends with four medals - the most by a Brit at a Games - after silver in the men's 4x100m medley relay.

title: Tokyo Olympics: Caeleb Dressel wins his fourth gold of the games in 50m freestyle
description: Watch USA's Caeleb Dressel win the 50m freestyle "by miles" to claim his fourth gold medal of the Tokyo Olympic Games.
